title: Louverval
text:
Louverval is a village in the <a href="Doignies">Doignies</a> <a href="Communes%20of%20France">commune</a> in the <a href="Nord%20%28French%20department%29">Nord</a> <a href="Departments%20of%20France">department</a> in northern <a href="France">France</a>.
In 1918 it was the site of a minor battle between the <a href="11th%20Battalion%20%28Australia%29%23Louverval">Australian 11th Battalion</a> and the Germans during <a href="World%20War%20I">World War I</a> in which <a href="Charles%20Pope">Charles Pope</a> won a posthumous <a href="Victoria%20Cross">Victoria Cross</a>. It is the location of the <a href="Cambrai%20Memorial%20to%20the%20Missing">Cambrai Memorial to the Missing</a> (Louverval Military Cemetery).
